name: The Hunt: Search for Shauna
description:
Your search for the kidnapper of your crew member Shauna is nearly over. You have searched all over the Galaxy in your ship to end up at a space station devoted to scientific study. Your journey has nearly broke your ship and is on the verge of breaking down completely. You must get off your ship, enter the station, find Shauna and return to your ship.

The Hunt: Search for Shauna is a text adventure where you read a description of your surroundings and enter commands to complete your mission. The BBC Micro has graphics as well for you to look at your surroundings. The keyboard is used.
